questions.question: Are the windows, including the front door and entrance area clean?
questions.info:
Check that the area is free of:
• weeds
• litter
• cigarette butts
Are Interserve cleaning the windows regularly?

Does the shop team understand the difference between the Moses & William Hill SE process?
Do the Red & Yellow Box files contain the correct documentation?
questions.info:
Yellow:
• RGI’s and SE breaches only
• Spare RG leaflets
• Spare multi operator leaflets
• Information for SE customer leaflets
• Multi operator exclusion envelopes
• Spare incident report forms

Red:
• All other incident report forms
• 6 weeks daily total report forms
• Spare call about crime leaflets
• Spare citizen cards
• Spare daily total reports

questions.question: Is there evidence that the yellow box is being checked at the beginning of every shift?
Are previous RGI’s completed correctly?

questions.info: Does the colleague know how many SE customers the LBO has? Are they aware of any persistent breaching customers?

questions.info: Are the shop team aware of Responsible Gambling support available to customers to be discussed during RGIs? (National Gambling Helpline, Set Your Limits, SE and GM statements)

questions.info: Cover the categories of reporting and what information should be recorded on the IRF

questions.info:
• No derogatory names used
• No teams logged

questions.question: Are all documents in Section 4 of the H&S Manual present and in date?
questions.info:
Ensure there are a minimum of 5 risks identified on the site specific risk assessment including:
• Violence in the workplace
• Opening and closing the LBO
• Banking
• Emptying GM’s & SSBT’s
• A minimum of 1 additional risk
